extension.description: A VS Code extension that provides built-in code formatting, designed to enhance the MQL4/MQL5 development experience. It automatically replaces the C++ style arrow operator (`->`) with a dot operator (`.`) as you type.
command.formatAndReplace.title: MQL5 Format
command.forceApplyReplacements.title: Force Apply MQL Rules
configuration.scanLimit.description: The number of characters to scan backwards from the cursor for real-time replacements during typing.
configuration.debug.description: Enables detailed debug logging in the output channel.
configuration.useBundledClangFormat.desc: When enabled, the 'MQL5 Format' command will use the extension's bundled .clang-format file for formatting. When disabled, it will use your user-defined default formatter.
configuration.forceCppMode.description: Automatically set the language mode to 'C++' for MQL4/MQL5 files (.mq4, .mq5, .mqh) to enable C++ IntelliSense and other language features. Disable this if you want to use a different language mode for these files.
